item.title: ISL - Module1
item.description:
Prerequisite

Part I

The first quarter of this course (Information Security Lab) is about model-checking security protocols. We’ll learn some topics relavant to Formal Methods for Information Security.

As for the lab, we’ll gain practical experience using Tamarin, a SOTA tool on model verification.

EMV means Europay, Mastercard and Visa.

message_constructors_sample

attacks_on_NSPK: The Attacker can disguise as Alice to set up communication with Bob smoothly. Upon connection built, Attacker knows all the information Alice sends.

Part II

This part we’ll learn how to model security protocols in Tamarin, how to formalize security properties and how to construct proofs.
